item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Marine Le Pen banned from standing for office for five years
2. Trump says he is ‘not joking’ about seeking a third term in office
3. Global stock markets tumble as Trump’s tariffs loom
4. The people vs Musk: billionaire transforms Wisconsin court contest
5. ‘I still have nightmares’: the tourists shackled and jailed for weeks at US borders
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
